Comments.Message: The values for spellpower in Rawr right now are just educated guesses based on rules. Once the armory is back up, and has all the correct data, I'll refresh it all.

Errata - robes of the tempest in rawr had +3 spellpower. Looking further, it seems like every +5 damage and healing item gets +3 spellpower. I had a quick look to compare with Rawr 16.1 and there the socket bonuses are marked as 'healing', so I'm guessing you are taking 60% of the 'healing' value to convert to spellpower, whereas actually it seems socket bonuses for 'spell damage and healing' are straight 1-to-1 equivalents.

So ye, not worth changing the ruleset just for this exception when all the armories will be live with the new values before the end of the week.

Also you don't have enforce metagem requirements enabled if that is why you were expecting to see blue gems.
